meanings.definition: Any plant belonging to the genus Saxifraga, characterized by small, star-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The saxifrage in the garden has beautiful star-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent2: Rock gardens often feature the delicate saxifrage plant.
meanings.sent3: The saxifrage decided to throw a flower party in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like a saxifrage in full blossom.
meanings.sent5: The tiny saxifrage flowers sparkled like stars in the garden.

meanings.definition: A plant of the saxifrage genus, often used in rock gardens.
meanings.sent1: In the rock garden, the saxifrage plant thrived.
meanings.sent2: Gardeners appreciate the beauty of saxifrage in their designs.
meanings.sent3: The saxifrage plant told a joke to the pebbles in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her determination grew as strong as a saxifrage in rocky soil.
meanings.sent5: The saxifrage added a touch of elegance to the garden landscape.

meanings.definition: A plant with small, white flowers that grows in rocky areas.
meanings.sent1: The saxifrage with white flowers stood out among the rocks.
meanings.sent2: Hikers often spot saxifrage with its small, white blooms.
meanings.sent3: The saxifrage plant tried to blend in with the rocky crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her resilience bloomed like a saxifrage in harsh conditions.
meanings.sent5: The saxifrage's white flowers illuminated the rocky terrain.
